PHRASE.LANG: Wear this hat as Captain while playing Cutthroats, and no one will be able to Mutiny your ship! [#Legal]
Portez ce chapeau en tant que capitaine en jouant à Cutthroats et personne ne pourra organiser de mutinerie sur votre bateau ! [#Legal]
Schiffe von Kapitänen, die diesen Hut beim Spielen von "Halsabschneider" tragen, sind vor Meutereien geschützt! [#Legal]
Indossa questo cappello come Capitano quando giochi a Tagliagole e nessuno potrà ammutinare sulla tua nave! [#Legal]
¡Si juegas a Degolladores con esta casaca puesta, nadie podrá amotinarse en tu barco! [#Legal]
선장으로 무법자를 플레이하며 이 모자를 쓰면 그 누구도 반란을 일으킬 수 없습니다! [#Legal]
Wear this hat as Captain while playing Cutthroats, and no one will be able to Mutiny your ship! [#Legal]
戴上此帽子，船員便無法發動兵變！ [#Legal]
戴上此帽子，船員便無法發動兵變！ [#Legal]
Wear this hat as Captain while playing Cutthroats, and no one will be able to Mutiny your ship! [#Legal]
